entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • netcore ilasm /debug on IL file with large number of methods unexpectedly reports 0x80070057 #62030
  • CI failure (net48 x86): GenerateResource.cache is being used by another process #62028
  • Observability candidate items for .NET 7.0 #62027
    .NET 7.0
  • Logger Generator not able to Resolve Generic Type Constraints #62026
  • Inconsistent HttpHeadersNonValidated behavior when response header added to a request #62024
  • [API Proposal]: Make BigInteger implement IConvertible #62022
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.StopwatchTests.GetTimestamp test fails in the CI #62021
  • Ordering issues with `DYN_BLK` nodes #62014
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to find a class without the namespace #62010
  • [API Proposal]: Make the Task.CancellationToken property public #62006
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbJumpKind == BBJ_NONE || block->bbJumpKind == BBJ_ALWAYS' #62005
    7.0.0
  • json config file has modified,but dotnet 6 can't reload on change when run in k8s configmap #62004
  • X509v3 Subject Alternative Name DirName #61998
    Future

Closed

  • Move libraries shims under src/native #61864
    7.0.0
  • MemoryStream.Read() throws ArgumentOutOfRangexception in .NET 6 but ArgumentException in .NET 5 #61994
  • ParameterInfo.RawDefaultValue throws when default value is string.empty #57238
    Future
  • API proposal: control Process.FileName search path #44792
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in Marshal.DestroyStructure with embedded structs containing delegates #61839
    7.0.0
  • How can a .NET Core Web Api running on Ubuntu Linux access a shared path in Windows? #61915
  • .NET seems to special-case renaming of EML files #61991
  • ANSICodePage returns zero for Traditional_Spanish_CI_AS collation #61977
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Win32.Registry has no dotnet 6.0.0 nuget package release #62009
  • Unable to deserialize ienumerables that is not a list #61993
  • Regex Bug - Failing Basic Operations #62017
  • [ilverify] Using ilverify with --include-file, --exclude-file or --ignore-error-file gives a System.NullReferenceException #62012
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to evaluate a static member in a nested class #61462
    7.0.0
  • [Android](CryptoNative_HmacUpdate): Parameter 'data' must be a valid pointer' #61783
  • .NET 6 native host executable seems broken in two ways #62007
  • System.Net test suites crashing in CI on OSX #43686
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: is there any methods can implement [:,:,::-1] operate in python #61957
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/Crc32.Arm64/Crc32.Arm64_ro/Crc32.Arm64_ro.sh #61897
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • needLabel assert #62025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress trim warning caused by recent attribute removal changes #62023
    area-System.ComponentModel, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62020
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix some missing debug info #62018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use cross origin policy headers #62016
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] A draft of doc for describing debugger behavior. #62015
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavange fix #62008
    area-System.Net.Http
  • mono_runtime_delegate_invoke change to gc unsafe state #62003
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #62002
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add a github action to sync shared source from aspnetcore #61999
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • Reorganize libs.native #61958
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove support for Classic Xamarin for the Selector.GetHandle optimization, and add newer platforms. #61989
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.Console, System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher, System.IO.Pipes #61996
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Handle empty string parameter value in MetadataLoadContext #61457
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Remove SupportedOSPlatformAttribute("windows") from LdapSessionOption #61388
    area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Splitting the hardware intrinsic tests into more test groupings #61973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.Diagnostics.EventLog #61990
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #61985
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #61992
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Fix Android crypto asserts #61827
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • FIX - Using ilverify with --include-file, --exclude-file or --ignore-error-file gives a System.NullReferenceException #62013
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add some tests that validate debug info through ETW events #61962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute to runtime #61956
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use separate partials for iOS&tvOS instead of UnknowUnix in System.Diagnostics.Process #61871
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete dead code from `InferStructOpSizeAlign` #61880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up test intermediates when clean test rebuild is requested #62001
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make more extensive use of lvaGetDesc() #61494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • prevent concurrent access to IO buffers on macOS #61723
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc CI/test run improvements #61937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] debug with modularized runtime(s) #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve some cases of bad debug info propagation in optimized code #61846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Fix setting pipe used in PAL_ProbeMemory as nonblocking #61126
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update hash of the new CSE when resizing #61984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete `NumChildren`, `GetChild` and `gtGetChildPointer` #61875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Type memory maps with placeholders #61933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Restrict the Selector.GetHandle intrinsic to GetHandle implementations that take an IntPtr. #61987
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Both options for creating .NET 6 WinForms builds have serious show stoppers #22763
  • Globally installed 7.0-alpha breaks restore for 6.0 projects #22752
  • Cannot exit while running an uninstalled dotnet tool #22749
  • dotnet clean --runtime gives NETSDK1179 #22747

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove expected warning from linker test as it's no longer expected. #22760
    Area-ILLink
  • Use Environment.Process{Path,Id} & delete wrappers #22759
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix ILLink test instalibility #22750
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22729
    Area-Infrastructure
  • set encoding to UTF8 in case output is redirected (sdk-wide) #22713
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Change messages for ILLink #22636
    Area-ILLink
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0044 "make field readonly" false positive #57983
  • [Flaky Test] CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.AddUsingExactMatchBeforeRenameTracking #57982
  • [Flaky Test] VisualBasic.BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences #57980
  • confusion over whether string is nullable #57974
  • Missing quick action to clean up try/finally or try/catch/finally with an empty finally block #57973
  • Missing quick action for CS0546 ('accessor' : cannot override because 'property' does not have an overridable set accessor) #57972
  • Roslyn dosn't work on VSIX #57971
  • Roslyn emits unnecessary conv.u opcodes over transient pointers #57970
  • Folder based compilation in the .NET project #57967
  • How can you report a diagnostic from an incremental generator? #57965
  • No documentation on difference between RegisterSourceOutput and RegisterImplementationSourceOutput #57963

Closed

  • Navigate to original source from metadata fails to handle documentation comments #57924
    17.1
  • ChangeToRemoveAllGeneratedDocumentsUpdatesListCorrectly is flaky #56826

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into features/rawstringliterals #57981
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Read SourceLink info and call service to retrieve source from there #57978
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude unnecessary sqlite assemblies for .Net 6 host #57977
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify 'interpolation' data, and move to an easier to consume System.Range approach for it #57966
    Area-Compilers
  • Do less work during CI checkout #57960
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Switch to exclusively using semantic tokens range handling #57959
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57976
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge "list-patterns" feature into `main` branch #57962
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Clean-up/enhance completion telemetry #57868
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify the code around parsing interpolated string literals. #57945
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add IXamlEditAndContinueSolutionProvider for XAML Language Service #57932
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57964
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Treat doc comments line regular comments in metadata as source #57958
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List-patterns: add a few tests and add HasValidate flag #57914
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57961
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57956
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57984
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Share '@'-sign logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57946
    Area-Compilers
  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Share '$' logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57951
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Add VS integration test pipeline #57953
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add antiforgery (anti-csrf) support to minimal endpoints #38630
  • VS.Redist packages contain different .msi Package Codes than Bundles #38629
  • Service is not registered for AuthenticationStateProvider in AddBlazorWebView - WPF BlazorWebView #38628
  • Perf regression: mvc #38627
  • Perf improvement: json #38626
  • net6.0: Runtime error: invokeJSFromDotNet creating HostBuilder #38625
  • Correct implementation of custom AuthenticationStateProvider in server-side Blazor #38624
  • [Feature Request] - Add Support for rendering Render Fragment / Component into string #38622
  • Use Json Source Generators With Minimum APIs #38621
  • Unable to pack .NET 6 blazorserver as dotnet tool #38620
  • Blazor issue with new DotNetStreamReference in net6 #38618
  • Authentication failure - return a message to the user? #38617
  • Razor css isolation {APP ASSEMBLY}.styles.css 404 in Production mode #38616
  • {action} as parameter in GET route does not work - 404 #38615
  • Component E2E test failure in Ubuntu #38613

Closed

  • Blazor server side prefix url #38584
  • IIS tests are timing out #37915
    7.0-preview1
  • Can't launch Kestrel if the startup takes 'long' time in Visual Studio 2022 .NET 6 #38544
  • [Blazor] Availability of User in Startup #35611
  • Why was the "Individual User Accounts" option removed? #38583
    Discussions
  • Razor Class Library - Static Web Assets that are being built during the pack process don't get added in Net6.0 #38596
  • Misleading comment about UniqueJsonKeyClaimAction #38572
    7.0-preview1
  • [ANCM] Add support for equivalent of disallowRotationOnConfigChange #37463
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" after upgrading from .NET5 to .NET6 #38599
  • Authorization failure with resource - lack of documentation/warning/implementation #33958
    7.0-preview1
  • Versioning Api endpoints with webapi .net 6 and swagger error #37993
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Memory leak in RazorView and ViewBuffer bundle #38550
  • Escaping the At symbol (@) fails if certain header metadata is included #15045
    Backlog
  • using AssemblyInfo.cs for "ASP.NET Core Web App" : Razor ". Views" dll gets version "0.0.0.0" #37795
    Discussions

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Split IISFunctionals startup/shadow copy tests #38575
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix UniqueJsonKeyClaimAction key comparison #38623
    area-security, 7.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky test RendersAuthorizingUntilAuthorizationCompletedAsync #38619
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `3e0e32b` #38567
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Visual Studio 2022 Release installation #38592
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Remove request-only headers from enumerator #38610
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Move off of expiring machine pools #38532
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use window.document for React-Native #38598
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The HideContentFromiOSBundleResources must also run for _CollectHotRestartBundleResources #3546
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • GridLayout.RowSpacing is not removed from available space when doing calculations #3545
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • GridLayout.RowSpacing does not trigger hot reload to refresh #3544
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Border loses shape if stroke is 0 #3543
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Deployment error 0700 when building as Windows app #3542
  • Border does not appear when Width/Weight is set #3541
    6.0.200-preview.11

Closed

  • [Bug] Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.Web.WebView2.Wpf.WebView2.add_AcceleratorKeyPressed #2885
    6.0.101-preview.10

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update WebView2 version to 1.0.1020.30 #3540
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix Modal Appearing/Disappearing #3535
  • Setup first set of Automation Properties #3222
    area/a11y
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets need to go into NUPKG #3532
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Move most of the types in the Platform folder to the Platform namespaces #3495
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513
    area/shell 🐢, area/FlyoutPage

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Jagged and Multidimensional Arrays (Cosmos DB) #26824
  • Error with dotnet ef tools when using a combo of HasKey and HasNoKey #26823
  • Db function to translate row value syntax #26822
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Entity Framework Core 6.0 when using Query Filters #26821
  • Optionally bring back join tables on scaffold db in EF Core 6 #26820
  • Entity tracking #26819
  • Support "Add" on View-DbSets for InMemoryDbProvider #26817
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection throws a System.NullReferenceException #26816
  • Custom ValueConverterSelector does not work in version 6 for cosmos provider #26815
  • ManyToMany UsedEntity separate PK configuration bugged without error message #26814
  • ef migrations script - Unrecognized option -o error #26813
  • The Collation specified by Sql Server is not supported #26812
  • Can we Add a new extentsion line AddInclude on IQueryable<T> interface? #26810
  • How to query if a varbinary has a byte value? #26809

Closed

  • Efcore 6 - FK OnDelete action not respected when creating Migrations Code-First #26818
  • Why EF core get different results when use AsNoTracking #26811
  • Unexpected CAST decimal Value Objects to decimal(18,2) #26804

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure
  • Adding support for owned types mapped to same table as well as different tables #26706
  • Suppress warnings on uninitialized DbSet properties #26795
  • Log warning when credentials used for reverse enigineering does not have view definition rights #26776
  • Call sync connection close instead of async #26793

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NETCoreSdkPortableRuntimeIdentifier is not the portable rid on source-built SDK #12515

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-108968-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11997
